QuestData.Title: Blades of the Anointed
QuestData.Description: The problem with the Scarlet Crusade is that they keep coming back, even after death.$B$BBehind those resurrections is High Inquisitor Whitemane. With her death, so goes the Crusade.$B$BTo give her the final rest, we need two swords of legend, each with a lost but storied history.$B$BLuckily for me... er, us, these two blades of the anointed are at rest here within the monastery.$B$BFind them and once you've killed Whitemane, plunge the blades into her corpse to make the death permanent.
QuestData.LogDescription: Collect the two Blades of the Anointed.
QuestData.CompletionText: <With one blade already in your possession, you move to take the other.>$B$B<An inscription on the statue behind the sword reads, "The Hand of Providence".>
QuestData.RewardText: <The second anointed blade floats just in front of the wet statue. Steam rises from the sword.>$B$B<You get the uncanny feeling that the Hand of Providence has been waiting for you.>
